reviews.review: Great professor! His lectures are clear and engaging, and he makes complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommended for anyone taking Math.
reviews.subject: Math

reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is very knowledgeable and approachable. However, her exams are tough, and you need to study hard to do well. Overall, a good experience.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Interesting lectures but can be a bit disorganized. Make sure to attend all classes because the material isn't always in the textbook.
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is excellent! She provides real-world examples that make the subject matter come alive. The workload is reasonable, and she is very supportive.
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: Very knowledgeable in his field, but his teaching style can be a bit dry. You'll learn a lot, but you need to stay focused.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Prof. Taylor is amazing! She is very patient and always willing to help. Her classes are interactive, and she really cares about her students.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Good professor but very strict with deadlines. Make sure to stay on top of assignments. He knows the material well but expects a lot from his students.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Her lectures are thorough and detailed, but sometimes it's hard to keep up with the pace. If you're prepared to work hard, you'll do well in her class.
reviews.subject: Statistics

reviews.review: Prof. Green is okay. His lectures are sometimes hard to follow, and the exams are challenging. Not the best, but not the worst either.
reviews.subject: Philosophy

reviews.review: An outstanding professor! She explains concepts very clearly and is always available for extra help. Her passion for teaching is evident.
reviews.subject: Literature
